sections.heading: Overview
content: Elliot S. Katz, MD, is a practicing orthopedist in Arizona and is also licensed in California.
Katz graduated from the University of Illinois Medicine School.  He then completed his residency in Orthopedic Surgery at the Mayo Clinic in Rochester, Minn.

Katz is a member of the American Medical Association.  He belongs to the American Academy of Orthopedic Surgery and the American Board of Orthopedic Surgeons.  He is also a Fellow of the American College of Surgeons.
Katz is board certified by the American Board of Orthopedic Surgery and is a Diplomat of the National Board of Medical Examiners.
He is a physician reviewer for Physicians' Review Network, Inc., an independent medical review organization.
